name: doope.jp 調整
css:
@-moz-document domain("doope.jp") {
ul#pickup,
div.htoolbox,
div#menu,
div#side,
div#fwrap,
div#cont_special,
div.tboxfl03,
div.tboxfl01,
div.fb_f,
ins#aswift_0_expand,
#head_box,
div.categorybox,
.cont_articlebox_02a,
.tboxfl04,
.at_adwbox,
.amazonbox,
.cont_art02,
.adsbygoogle,
.descbox
{display:none !important;}

#cont h4,
h4.tith401
{font-weight:bold;}

#phead
{height:40px;}

#h1_logo,
#h1_logo a
{height:28px;}

.cont_footbox_03,
#pbody,
.cont_box
{background:none !important;}

#cwrap
{background:white;}

.cont_titbox
{margin:0; padding:0; width:100%;}

div.cont_box
{padding:0;}

div#pbody
{width:80%; border-top:0;}

#cwrap,
div#cont,
.cont_box
{width:100%;}

.cont_article,
.cont_article ul,
.cont_related,
.cont_related ul
{width:95%;}
}
